catalog_metadata.name: ICP cluster on VMware
catalog_metadata.description: Deploy ICP on Vmware and import the cluster to the IBM MCM 3.2.1 controller using IBM MCM 3.2.1 Klusterlet
catalog_metadata.longDescription:
Deploy ICP 3.2.1 on chosen topology [Single node, Medium with multi worker node and Full HA].
Import the cluster to the IBM MCM 3.2.1 controller using IBM MCM 3.2.1 Klusterlet.
catalog_metadata.author: admin

tags.name: Request_Group
tags.label: Request_Group
tags.description: The current context group id of the current user that requested the provisioning of the template. This is important because a user may be part of more than one group and this identifies the context of which group the user made the request.

tags.name: Request_User
tags.label: Request_User
tags.description: The user id of the current user that requested the provisioning of the template.

tags.name: Service_Name
tags.label: Service_Name
tags.description: Name provided for the service instance by the end user at time of request

tags.name: Service_Identifier
tags.label: Service_Identifier
tags.description: Unique identifer generated by ICAM which is mapped to the service instance of the template provisioned.

actions.name: Provision
actions.description: Default action for deployment of service

input_parameters.name: kub_version
input_parameters.label: Kubernetes version
input_parameters.description: kubernetes version to install

input_parameters.name: docker_binary_url
input_parameters.label: Docker binary download URL
input_parameters.description: URL to download docker binary
input_parameters.regexdesc: http|https|ftp|file Location to download the IBM Cloud Private Docker Binaries

input_parameters.name: icp_binary_url
input_parameters.label: ICP binary URL
input_parameters.description: URL to download ICP binary
input_parameters.regexdesc: http|https|ftp|file Location to download the IBM Cloud Private Binaries

input_parameters.name: icp_cluster_name
input_parameters.label: ICP cluster name
input_parameters.description: ICP cluster name.
input_parameters.regexdesc: Name must 72 characters in length. Must consist of lower case alphanumeric characters or '-', and must start and end with an alphanumeric character.

input_parameters.name: icp_admin_user
input_parameters.label: ICP admin user
input_parameters.description: ICP admin user name

input_parameters.name: icp_admin_password
input_parameters.label: ICP admin password
input_parameters.description: ICP admin user password
input_parameters.regexdesc: Allow alphanumeric characters or - symbol. Must have at least 32 characters

input_parameters.name: enable_kibana
input_parameters.label: Enable Kibana
input_parameters.description: Select true to enable kibana on ICP cluster, false otherwise.

input_parameters.name: enable_monitoring
input_parameters.label: Enable Monitoring
input_parameters.description: Select true to enable monitoring on ICP cluster, false otherwise.

input_parameters.name: icp_version
input_parameters.label: ICP version
input_parameters.description: ICP version to install

input_parameters.name: vm_clone_timeout
input_parameters.label: VM clone timeout period
input_parameters.description: VM clone timeout period

input_parameters.name: vm_domain
input_parameters.label: Domain name
input_parameters.description: Domain name

input_parameters.name: boot_hostname_ip
input_parameters.label: Boot node hostname and IPv4
input_parameters.description: ICP boot node hostname and IPv4 address

input_parameters.name: singlenode_hostname_ip
input_parameters.label: Single node hostname ip
input_parameters.description: Hostname and IPv4 address for single node VM

input_parameters.name: enable_metering
input_parameters.label: Enable metering
input_parameters.description: Select true to enable metering on ICP cluster, false otherwise.

input_parameters.name: enable_vm_management
input_parameters.label: Enable management node
input_parameters.description: Select true to create management node, false otherwise.

input_parameters.label: Manage node Hostname and IPv4 address
input_parameters.description: Manage node Hostname and IPv4 address

input_parameters.description: Worker node hostname and IPv4 address

input_parameters.description: Select true to create VA node, false otherwise.

input_parameters.description: OS root user for ICP nodes

input_parameters.description: IBM MCM Controller (hub cluster) details will be used to import a managed cluster to the controller.
